title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook Spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat eggs with permesan and pepper.
Drain past and quickly mix with pancetta and egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 1 hour.
Heat tomato puree in a pan and stir in cream.
Add grilled chicken and simmer for 10 minutes.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Crispy bread topped with mashed avocado, olive oil, and a sprinkle of salt
